@graph.description: Alveolar macrophages collected from bronco alveolar lavages of BALB/c mice were incubated without (control) or with bacteriophage PAK_P1 or fluorescent beads for 1 hour, 3 hours and 5 hours, in presence of absence of cytochalasin B and then fixed before imaging
@graph.name: Phagocytosis assay of murine alveolar macrophages with bacteriophage PAK_P1 and fluorescent beads

@graph.description: Murine Alveolar Macrophage
@graph.name: AM Control without Cytochalasin B

@graph.description: Murine Alveolar Macrophage
@graph.name: AM + PAK_P1 with Cytochalasin B

@graph.description: Murine Alveolar Macrophage
@graph.name: AM + Beads without Cytochalasin B

@graph.description: Murine Alveolar Macrophage
@graph.name: AM + PAK_P1 without Cytochalasin B

@graph.description: Murine Alveolar Macrophage
@graph.name: AM + Beads with Cytochalasin B

@graph.description: Murine Alveolar Macrophage
@graph.name: AM Control with Cytochalasin B

@graph.description:
Stack image acquisition with Z pas of 0.30µm with the following channels:
Beads : nuclei with DAPI (388nm) with exposure time of 9.28 ms, FITC (A488) with exposure time of 50 ms, Actine Cy3 (A546) with exposure time at 4.85 ms
Control : nuclei with DAPI (388nm) with exposure time of 9.28 ms, FITC (A488) with exposure time of 177 ms, Actine Cy3 (A546) with exposure time at 9.58 ms, CellMask Cy5 (A64) with exposure time of 10.13 ms
PAK_P1: nuclei with DAPI (388nm) with exposure time of 9.28 ms, PAK_P1 FITC (A488) with exposure time of 177 ms, Actine Cy3 (A546) with exposure time at 9.58 ms, CellMask Cy5 (A64) with exposure time of 10.13 ms
@graph.name: M1 to M39
